description: UX-6: Dashboard Transformation — Rebuild hero net worth card with purple glow and animated number ticker, create reusable change badge, add stagger animations to all dashboard sections, polish summary cards/allocation/top performers, and apply design tokens throughout.

userStories.title: Create animated number ticker component
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see numbers animate when values change so updates feel dynamic and rewarding.
acceptanceCriteria: Create components/dashboard/number-ticker.tsx
On initial mount: counts up from 0 to target value over 600ms using spring physics (numberSpring preset)
On value change: morphs from previous value to new value over 400ms
Supports currency formatting (e.g., $1,248,593.00) — digits animate individually for slot machine feel
Props: value: number, currency: Currency, className?: string, prefix?: string
Handles negative values (displays minus sign, then animates absolute value)
Respects prefers-reduced-motion — shows final value instantly, no animation
Does not cause layout shift during animation (fixed-width digit slots or tabular-nums font feature)
Typecheck passes (npm run build)
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Create change badge component
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a reusable change badge so percentage changes are displayed consistently across the dashboard.
acceptanceCriteria: Create components/dashboard/change-badge.tsx
Props: amount: number, percentage: number, currency: Currency, size?: 'sm' | 'md', showAmount?: boolean
Positive values: text-positive text, bg-positive/10 background, TrendingUp icon
Negative values: text-destructive text, bg-destructive/10 background, TrendingDown icon
Zero/no change: text-muted-foreground, neutral icon (Minus or dash)
Size sm: compact for table cells and small cards (rounded-full px-2 py-0.5)
Size md: standard for hero card and summary cards (rounded-full px-3 py-1)
Typecheck passes (npm run build)
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Create stale data indicator component
userStories.description: As a user, I want to know which values are stale so I trust the data I'm seeing.
acceptanceCriteria: Create components/dashboard/stale-indicator.tsx
Props: isStale: boolean, lastUpdated?: Date | string, variant?: 'icon' | 'badge'
Icon variant: amber AlertTriangle icon with tooltip showing 'Last updated: X ago'
Badge variant: amber pill badge showing 'X ago' with warning icon
Uses design tokens (amber colour — add --warning CSS variable if not present, or use amber directly)
Tooltip uses shadcn/ui Tooltip component
Used by: hero card (existing stale warning), summary cards, holdings table
Typecheck passes (npm run build)
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

Existing sparkline preserved (inline to right of value on desktop, below on mobile)
Stale data warning icon preserved (amber, top-right corner)
'as of' timestamp preserved in text-muted-foreground text-body-sm

userStories.title: Responsive dashboard grid refinement
